summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in New York dated July 7, 2019, reporting on the execution of a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the previous night. The email details the seizure of evidence including binders referencing victims, CDs and images of young girls, and plaster busts of female breasts. It also mentions plans to approach co-conspirators, serve grand jury subpoenas, and conduct victim interviews.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The search was executed at his Manhattan residence, and evidence was seized from his home.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, reporting on the search execution and evidence seized from Epstein's residence.

connections.description: The FBI agent is conducting a search of Epstein's residence and investigating the case.

events.title: Search of Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: Law enforcement executed a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan, seizing numerous items of evidence including binders referencing victims, CDs and images of young girls, pictures of young females, and plaster busts of female breasts.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: News articles from CNN and Daily Beast reported on the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein, with a court date set for Monday.

events.title: Scheduled court date for Epstein
events.description: A court date was set for Monday, July 8, 2019, following Epstein's arrest.

keyFacts: A search of Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence on July 6, 2019, yielded significant evidence including binders with labels referencing victims, CDs and images of young girls (some borderline child pornography), pictures of young females throughout the house, and plaster cast busts of female breasts.
The search lasted until 6:30 a.m. on July 7, 2019, indicating an extensive overnight operation.
Law enforcement was in the process of approaching co-conspirators and serving grand jury subpoenas at the time of the email.
Victim interviews were scheduled to commence in the next few days following the search.
Epstein's arrest was reported by CNN and Daily Beast on July 6, 2019, with a court date set for Monday, July 8, 2019.
